Class FloatShortConvolutionStrategy

java.lang.Object
  org.apfloat.internal.FloatBaseMath

All Implemented Interfaces:
ConvolutionStrategy, FloatRadixConstants, java.io.Serializable
public class FloatShortConvolutionStrategy
extends FloatBaseMath
implements ConvolutionStrategy, FloatRadixConstants

Short convolution strategy. Performs a simple multiplication when the size of one operand is 1.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mikko Tommila
